Posts.Content: hkraus wrote: My cancer has mets to submandibular gland (close to salivary)  I just had the nodes and salivary glands removed.  Two weeks past surgery still swollen, has anyone had a neck disection and how  long before  back to somewhat normal feeling? I know this is very unusual, every dr. I have met says "oh, you are the one", we've never heard of this before.  Because it is so unusual had three path reports, different locations, all confirmed breast cancer.  However at this time still can't find a site except for my neck.  Thanks, Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: neck disection hkraus Kellke

Posts.Content: Jun 26, 2008 03:26PM hkraus wrote: Both Barnes-Jewish Hosp. on St. Louis and Northwestern/Prentice for women in Chicago are very good.  I have had experience with both.  NW for the primary treatment and B-J for a second opinion.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: Best facilities near Galesburg, IL Cookie557 Cookie557

Posts.Content: hkraus wrote: I had a lump removed in the lymph node by my ear.  Results came back as breast cancer.  I have had ultrasounds, CT scans, PET scans, mamograms, bone scans and the site is not located.  Put on Tamofin.  Has anyone else heard or been in this position?  The drs. want to just watch and wait for 4-6 months, thoughts? thanks, Lenny Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: unknown primary metastatic disease hkraus PJB
